resources.string: 1) support multiple people with the same routing WIFI intercom, and the software opens by default is a group chat mode
2) hold down the recording button and send a number of people by the pine hand
3) the broadcast function should be opened by route, and only two people can be used to chat without opening
1) the other party and you need to tell each other to each other by the LAN IP that the software displays, fill in the other's IP, and fill in your IP.
The other side and you need to open this page, the LAN IP on the head to each other to tell each other, fill in the other's IP, the other is also filled with your IP, and then switch!
